title: 求助，mc1.9突然The game exited abnormally, exit code: 1打不开了
author: Wonwayshon
txt_content:
[17:45:21] [main/INFO] *** Hello Minecraft! Launcher 2.4.1.44 ***
[17:45:21] [main/INFO] Initialized settings.
[17:45:38] [AWT-EventQueue-0/INFO] Start generating launching command...
[17:45:38] [Game Launcher/INFO] Building process
[17:45:38] [Game Launcher/INFO] Logging in...
[17:45:38] [Game Launcher/INFO] Detecting libraries...
[17:45:38] [Game Launcher/INFO] Unpacking natives...
[17:45:39] [Game Launcher/INFO] *** Make shell command ***
[17:45:39] [Game Launcher/INFO] On making head command.
[17:45:39] [Game Launcher/INFO] Java Version: 1.7.0_71
[17:45:39] [Game Launcher/INFO] Java Platform: 64
[17:45:39] [Game Launcher/INFO] System Platform: 64
[17:45:39] [Game Launcher/INFO] System Physical Memory: 3979
[17:45:39] [Game Launcher/INFO] On making launcher args.
[17:45:39] [Game Launcher/INFO] Starting process
[17:45:39] [Game Launcher/INFO] Have started the process
[17:45:41] [ProcessMonitor/INFO] Process exit code: 1
[17:45:41] [ProcessMonitor/ERROR] The game exited abnormally, exit code: 1
之前玩的好好得，突然就再也打不开了，用的hmcl启动器，求助各位大佬

replies.author: 小米DADA
replies.txt_content:
唔...如果没错的话，楼主用的是N卡吧。
N卡最近出现了小问题回滚驱动即可，我今天早上也是这样


Minecraft：嘿！我们听说Nvidia驱动378.49有点问题，Nvidia方面正在加紧修复，但我们建议尽量不要更新此驱动。
Searge：如果你的Minecraft突然停止工作了，这可能就是问题的潜在原因。
